lines.gurmukhi: Aink AnUp rUp rUp smsr nwNih; AMimRq kotwin koit mDur bcn sr [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Many other beautiful forms may be there but none can reach near the effulgent form of the beloved True Guru nor millions of elixir-like items can reach the sweet words of the True Guru.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Anykwˆ AnUpm rUp aus ipAwry dy rUp dy brwbr nhIˆ ho skdy qy nw hI Axigxq AMimRq aus dy im`Ty bcnwˆ dI brwbrI kr skdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: Drm ArQ kpit kwmnw ktwC pr; vwr fwrau ibibD mukq mMdhwsu pr [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: I sacrifice all four desires of life over a look of grace of my True Guru. I can sacrifice myriad salvations over a sweet smile of my True Guru. (Dharam, arth, Kaam and mokh are paltry over the smile and look of grace of the True Guru).

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kRoVwˆ Drm; ArQ; kwm Awid pdwrQ aus dI iek myhr BrI nzr qoˆ kurbwn kr idAwˆ; Anyk pRkwr dI mukqI aus dI im`TI muskwn qoˆ vwr su`twˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: sÍrg AnMq kot ikMcq smwgm kY; sMgm smUh suK swgr n qul Dr [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Comforts of millions of heavens cannot match even a momentary meeting with True Guru and comforts on total meeting with Him are beyond the capacity of oceans.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ausdy QoVy ijhy myl auqoˆ byAMq svrg kurbwn kr idAwˆ Aqy aus nwl pUrn myl nwl qwˆ suKwˆ dy smuMdr nUM BI brwbrI nw idAwˆ[

lines.gurmukhi: pRym rs ko pRqwp sr kCU pUjY nwih; qn mn Dn srbs bilhwr kr [646[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: No one can reach the glory and loving elixir of the True Guru. I sacrifice my body, mind and wealth unto Him.  (646)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: s`c jwxoˆ ik pRym rs dy pRqwp dy brwbr koeI BI cIz nhIˆ pu`j skdI; ijsqoˆ ik mYˆ qn mn Dn qy srbMs kurbwn kr dyvwˆ ]646]
